org.spongepowered.api.text

Interface TextRepresentation


  • public interface TextRepresentation
    Interface for a certain representation of a Text object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Text from(String input)
      Return a Text instance from an appropriately formatted string.
      Text fromUnchecked(String input)
      Tries to return a Text instance from the provided input string.
      String to(Text text)
      Return a string representation of the provided text in a format that will be accepted by this serializer's from(String) (String)} method.
      String to(Text text, Locale locale)
      Return a string representation of the provided text in a format that will be accepted by this serializer's from(String) (String)} method and is appropriate for the given locale.

    • Method Detail

      • to

        String to(Text text)
        Return a string representation of the provided text in a format that will be accepted by this serializer's from(String) (String)} method.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to convert to a string representation
        Returns:
        An appropriate string representation of this text

      • to

        String to(Text text,
          Locale locale)
        Return a string representation of the provided text in a format that will be accepted by this serializer's from(String) (String)} method and is appropriate for the given locale.
        Parameters:
        text - The text to serialize
        locale - The locale to serialize this text in
        Returns:
        An appropriate string representation of this text

      • from

        Text from(String input)
   throws TextMessageException
        Return a Text instance from an appropriately formatted string.
        Parameters:
        input - The raw input to parse into a text
        Returns:
        An appropriate Text object from the input string
        Throws:
        TextMessageException - if an error occurs while parsing the input

      • fromUnchecked

        Text fromUnchecked(String input)
        Tries to return a Text instance from the provided input string. However, if the input string is not of a valid format, the returned Text object will be of the raw input, rather than throwing an exception.
        Parameters:
        input - The raw input to try to parse into a text
        Returns:
        An appropriate Text object from the input string, or the raw input
